Title: The Extraction
Description:
Right now the most important thing is to bring back my people. Preferably in one piece.

And as much as it pains me to say this, I'm in no condition to fight them on my own. 

Will you help us?
ObjectivesText: Rescue tuskarr from the Snowhide Camp in the Azure Span.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Frostbite to learn more about the tuskarr hunters
RewardText: You smell like death... Frostbite likes that.
